_header: In womanhood as auctors all write
Title(s): A Balade declaring that wemens chastite Doeth moche excel all treasure worldly
_description: ‘A Balade declaring that wemens chastite Doeth moche excel all treasure worldly’ — ten stanzas rhyme royal: an extract in Stow from The Fall of Princes (1904) made up of Bk IV.2374-87 and Bk III.1373-1421.

CamTCC599.First Lines:
In Womanhede as Auctours all wryteMost thyng commendyd ys theyre
                    chaste honeste…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…But from all daunger that shuld theym nor or greveByn euer
                    redy to helpe hem and releue Explicit
